Mary Carlin (13 Ọgọst 1873 - 5 Eprel 1939) bụ onye otu ọrụ aka nke Britain.
A mụrụ ya na Eastwood, Nottinghamshire, Carlin ghọrọ onye na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 1916, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ ghọrọ onye nhazi mba, maka Dock, Wharf, Riverside na General Labourers' Union
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Women's Advisory Council nke Ministry of Munitions, na kọmitii nyocha banyere Women's Army Auxiliary Corps.
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Carlin malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na No More War Movement, na-ahazi nnukwu ngagharị iwe na 1922

Ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama na Labour Party, a họpụtara ya na National Executive Committee na 1924 ma jee ozi ọtụtụ afọ.  O guzoro n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na Balham na Tooting na ntuli aka 1928 London County Council.  N'afọ 1930, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu maka Westminster Abbey, ọ bụ ezie na o mechara ghara iguzo.

Òtù ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Transport and General Workers' Union, Carlin ghọkwara onye ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ na odeakwụkwọ nke Women's Guild.  Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe nke ndị ọka ikpe dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ọrụ.  Ọ lara ezumike nká na ngwụcha afọ 1930 wee nwụọ na mberede na 1939.
